name: Multiverse Justice
description:
In the year 1993 a robot called Menace was brought to life by a young boy. The robot then vanished never to be seen again.
Or so he thought.
In 2008 Menace started to wreck havoc in Capital City taking the President of the United Nations of Earth and his government hostages.
The young boy, now the world greatest scientist, never stopped worrying about Menace’s return. He discovered the way to travel between universes and planned on using it to save the world from Menace’s menace…
So far he could only travel to another world were Menace has already destroyed everything. He was on his way to his lab to grab the last piece of equipment to travel to the third world and save humanity.
That’s when Menace, aware of his plan, caught up with him…
